page.title: 16Home Life
page.content: A survey revealed that 82% of the people interviewed ate Yorkshire Pudding at least once a week.66% ate it with onion gravy before their main meal.Many ate it more than once a week. {Recipe.}1 egg,5fl.oz. milk,tsp salt, 3dsp. plain flour,1dsp. water,knob of lard or dripping,baking tin. Oven,very hot,Gas 7,425 deg.Switch on 15 mins. before. 1.Put egg,flour,salt and half liquid into jug.Thoroughly beat out all lumps. 2.Slowly add rest of liquid,beating continuously. 3.Allow fat to melt in tin in oven. 4.Pour in mixture,1/4" deep. 5.Cook on top shelf of oven for 15 mins. approx. turning if needed. Other typical{food}is curd tart and spice cake with cheese.
